summary: A pair of rivaling stage magicians are forced to confront their falling out over a guillotine mishap when they compete in a magic competition.
cast: Robert Webb|David Mitchell|Sarah Hadland|Paul Mark Elliott|Karen Seacombe|Phil Nice|Jessica Hynes|Darren Boyd|Miranda Hart|Angel Coulby|Robin Weaver|Priyanga Burford|Andrea Riseborough|Geoffrey McGivern|Marek Larwood|Tim Plester|Steve Edge|Lucy Rhodes|Katy Wix|Eleanor Matsuura|Gemma Charlotte|Patrick Page|Peter Capaldi|Luigi D'Allessandro|Ron Brooks|Rasmus Hardiker|Scott Penrose|George Keeler|Juliet Cowan|James Bachman|Catherine Shepherd|Stephen Aintree|Alexander Kirk|James Smith|Rose Keegan|Jane Laver|Tom Meeten|Alex Macqueen|Adrian Hood|Sally Chattaway|Vimala Rowe|Aladin|Ali Bongo|Gemma Cousins|Rosie Fellner|James Mellor|Anthony Owen
title: Magicians
